content: *perfect for a spring baby shower or for easter this little amigurumi lamb makes an adorable gift for your little one lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80093ad skill level easy 2 colors 1 ball each a 790-300 homespun yarn hepplewhite b 620-152 wool-ease yarn oxford grey crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers small amount of black yarn 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing exact gauge is not essential for this project some construction required to finish also available on michaels com on the wayback machine as lion brand crochet little lamb 1 1 https //web archive org/web/20121230183540/http //www michaels com/lion-brand-crochet-little-lamb/e06855 default pd html
